Meta.title: Panda Living Weapon Mod
Meta.author: Now Happy Panda
Meta.description: Add Living Weapon that has 1/20 chane to spawn on random artifact melee weapons or ranged weapons Living Weapon grows from landing killing blow or enemy death, can be adjusted When the Living Weapon has enough Exp you can middle click it to select "Growth" option to open an enchant selecting window In the BepInEx configuration file (e.g., "SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\panda.livingweapon.mod.cfg") you can adjust: Spell trigger enchants spawn in selector or not Abosrb life/mana/stamina enchants spawn in selector or not Life/mana/stamina score enchants spawn in selector or not DV/PV/FPV enchants spawn in selector or not Critical/vorpal/penetration enchants spawn in selector or not Physical Damage Reduction/Elemental Damage Reduction/Perfect Evasion enchants spawn in selector or not All equiped living items gain exp from enemy death or not The maximum number of enchants in selector The rarity of living weapon, 1 in x chance
